file.name: OpenApi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: "DevX API"
  version: "20210528.1"
servers:
  - url: https://graphexplorerapi.azurewebsites.net/
    description: Main server
  - url: https://graphexplorerapi-staging.azurewebsites.net/
    description: Staging server
  - url: https://localhost:44399/
    description: Local test server
  - url: https://localhost:5001/
    description: Local test server

paths:
  /snippetgenerator:
    post:
      tags:
        - snippets
      summary: Show language code snippets
      description: Obtains a language code snippet from an example HttpRequestMessage sent out to the graph endpoint
      operationId: snippetgenerator.ListSnippets
      parameters:
        - name: lang
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - C#
              - Javascript
              - Java
              - Go
              - PowerShell
              - TypeScript
            default: C#
        - name: generation
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - odata
              - openapi
            default: odata
      requestBody:
        description: HTTP request message to be translated into code.
        content:
          text/message;version=1.1;msgtype=request:
            schema:
              type: string
            examples:
              GetUserProfile:
                value: |
                  GET /v1.0/users/joe@tenant.com HTTP/1.1
                  Host: https://graph.microsoft.com
                  Accept: application/json
              SendMail:
                value: |
                  POST /v1.0/me/sendMail
                  Host: https://graph.microsoft.com
                  Content-type: application/json
                  {
                    "message": {
                      "subject": "Meet for lunch?",
                      "body": {
                        "contentType": "Text",
                        "content": "The new cafeteria is open."
                      },
                      "toRecipients": [
                        {
                          "emailAddress": {
                            "address": "fannyd@contoso.onmicrosoft.com"
                          }
                        }
                      ],
                      "ccRecipients": [
                        {
                          "emailAddress": {
                            "address": "danas@contoso.onmicrosoft.com"
                          }
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    "saveToSentItems": "false"
                  }
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Generated language snippet
          content:
            "text/plain":
              examples:
                "C# GetUserProfile":
                  value: |
                    var user = await client.Me.Request().GetAsync();
        "400":
          description: Bad request
  /samples:
    get:
      tags:
        - samples
      summary: Sample queries
      description: Get all Microsoft Graph API sample queries from Azure blob or a specified GitHub repository. Filter by category, humanName or tip.
      operationId: samples.ListSamples
      parameters:
        - name: search # /samples?search=user
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: category, humanName or tip.
        - name: org
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Organization that a GitHub repo belongs to.
        - name: branchName
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target branch in the target GitHub repo.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/sample"
              example:
                SampleQueries:
                  - id: b4fbcb7a-b80e-4254-b37c-224b8513badb
                    category: Applications
                    method: GET
                    humanName: retrieve application properties
                    requestUrl: "/v1.0/applications/{application-id}"
                    docLink: "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http"
                    headers: null
                    tip: "This query requires an application id. To find the ID of an application, you can run: GET https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/applications"
                    postBody: null
                    skipTest: false
        "204":
          description: No content
        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
  /samples/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - samples
      summary: Sample query by id
      description: Get a specific sample query by its id.
      operationId: samples.GetSample
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Sample query id
        - name: org
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Organization that a GitHub repo belongs to.
        - name: branchName
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target branch in the target GitHub repo.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/sample"
              example:
                SampleQueries:
                  - id: b4fbcb7a-b80e-4254-b37c-224b8513badb
                    category: Applications
                    method: GET
                    humanName: retrieve application properties
                    requestUrl: "/v1.0/applications/{application-id}"
                    docLink: "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http"
                    headers: null
                    tip: "This query requires an application id. To find the ID of an application, you can run: GET https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/applications"
                    postBody: null
                    skipTest: false
        "204":
          description: No content
        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
  /permissions: #  GET /permissions?requesturl=/me/memberof&method=GET&scopetype=DelegatedWork
    get:
      tags:
        - permissions
      summary: Permissions information
      description: Get list of permissions information that enable access to a specified resource (or all the Microsoft Graph API endpoints), from least to most privileged.
      operationId: permissions.ListPermissions
      parameters:
        - name: requestUrl
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Microsoft Graph API endpoint url.
        - name: method
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - GET
              - PUT
              - POST
              - PATCH
              - DELETE
          required: false
          description: Http method
        - name: scopeType
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - DelegatedWork
              - DelegatedPersonal
              - Application
            default: DelegatedWork
          required: false
          description: A valid Microsoft Graph API permission category.
        - name: org
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Organization that a GitHub repo belongs to.
        - name: branchName
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target branch in the target GitHub repo.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Ordered array of permissions that enable access to a specified resource (or all the Microsoft Graph API endpoints), from least to most privileged along with detailed information about the permissions.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/permission"
              example:
                - value: Mail.ReadBasic
                  consentDisplayName: Read user basic mail
                  consentDescription: "Allows the app to read email in the signed-in user's mailbox except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties."
                  isAdmin: false
                - value: Mail.Read
                  consentDisplayName: "Read your mail "
                  consentDescription: "Allows the app to read email in your mailbox. "
                  isAdmin: false
                - value: Mail.ReadWrite
                  consentDisplayName: "Read and write access to your mail "
                  consentDescription: "Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail. "
                  isAdmin: false
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
  /changes:
    get:
      tags:
        - changes
      summary: Change log information
      description: Get change log information.
      operationId: changelog.ListChangelog
      parameters:
        - name: requestUrl
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string # https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/
          description: Microsoft Graph API endpoint url.
        - name: graphVersion
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: v1.0
          description: The target Microsoft Graph API version.
        - name: service
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          description: The owning team of the target Microsoft Graph API endpoint.
        - name: daysRange
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: number # 90
            default: 0
          description: The number of days in which to get the change log data for.
        - name: startDate
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string # YYYY-MM-DD
          description: The start date for when to start fetching the change log data.
        - name: endDate
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string # YYYY-MM-DD
          description: The end date for when to stop fetching the change log data.
        - name: page
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
          description: The page number to return.
        - name: pageLimit
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: The number of change log entries to be included in a single page.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/changeLog"
              example:
                changelog:
                  - ChangeList:
                      - Id: 6a6c7aa0-4b67-4d07-9ebf-c2bc1bcef553
                        ApiChange: Resource
                        ChangedApiName: "ediscoveryCase,reviewSet,reviewSetQuery"
                        ChangeType: Addition
                        Description: "Introduced the compliance eDiscovery API, including the [ediscoveryCase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/ediscoverycase?view=graph-rest-beta), [reviewSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reviewset?view=graph-rest-beta), and [reviewSetQuery](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reviewsetquery?view=graph-rest-beta), and operations."
                        Target: "ediscoveryCase,reviewSet,reviewSetQuery"
                    Id: 6a6c7aa0-4b67-4d07-9ebf-c2bc1bcef553
                    Cloud: prd
                    Version: beta
                    CreatedDateTime: "2020-07-01T00:00:00.000Z"
                    WorkloadArea: Compliance
                    SubArea: eDiscovery

        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
  /knownissues:
    get:
      tags:
        - knownissues
      summary: Known Issues
      description: Get all the Known Issues existing across different MS Graph APIs and keeping track of their statuses.
      operationId: knownIssues.ListKnownIssues
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/knownIssue"
              example:
                KnownIssues:
                  - Id: 9076,
                    State: Active,
                    Title: Accessing a shared calendar,
                    Description: Notifications fail when an organization has several Bookings businesses,
                    WorkloadArea: Notifications,
                    Workaround: Upgrade Notifications,
                    APIPathLink: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0
        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
  /openapi: # /openapi?url=/users&openApiVersion=3&graphVersion=beta&format=json&style=GEAutocomplete
    get:
      tags:
        - openapi
      summary: Microsoft Graph OpenAPI document
      description: Get the Microsoft Graph API metadata CSDL document as an OpenAPI document.
      operationId: openapi.GetDocument
      parameters:
        - name: url
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Microsoft Graph API endpoint url.
        - name: tags
          in: query
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          required: false
          description: Comma separated list of tags.
        - name: operationIds
          in: query
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          required: false
          description: Comma separated list of OperationIds or * for all the OperationIds.
        - name: openApiVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target OpenAPI version.
        - name: graphVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target Microsoft Graph API version.
        - name: style
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Plain
              - PowerPlatform
              - PowerShell
              - GEAutocomplete
            default: Plain
          required: false
          description: The client for which the OpenAPI document needs to be formatted for.
        - name: title
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            default: Partial Graph API
          required: false
          description: The OpenAPI document title.
        - name: format
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - json
              - yaml
            default: json
          description: The OpenAPI document output format.
        - name: forceRefresh
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          required: false
          description: Reload the OpenAPI document.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of operations associated to a tag/operationIds/url
          content:
            application/vnd.oai.openapi+json: {} # JSON
            application/vnd.oai.openapi: {} # YAML
    post:
      tags:
        - openapi
      summary: Convert a given CSDL document into an OpenAPI document.
      description: OpenAPI document from a CSDL document
      operationId: openapi.PostDocument
      parameters:
        - name: url
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: An API endpoint url.
        - name: tags
          in: query
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          required: false
          description: Comma separated list of tag names.
        - name: operationIds
          in: query
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          required: false
          description: Comma separated list of OperationIds or * for all the OperationIds.
        - name: openApiVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target OpenAPI version.
        - name: graphVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target API version.
        - name: style
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Plain
              - PowerPlatform
              - PowerShell
              - GEAutocomplete
            default: Plain
          required: false
          description: The client for which the OpenAPI document needs to be formatted for.
        - name: title
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            default: Partial Graph API
          required: false
          description: The OpenAPI document title.
        - name: format
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - json
              - yaml
            default: json
          description: The OpenAPI document output format.
        - name: forceRefresh
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          required: false
          description: Reload the OpenAPI document.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of operations associated to a tag/operationIds/url
          content:
            application/vnd.oai.openapi: {} # YAML
            application/vnd.oai.openapi+json: {} # JSON
  /openapi/operations:
    get:
      tags:
        - openapi.operations
      summary: All Microsoft Graph operations
      description: Get all the operations from the Microsoft Graph API metadata CSDL document.
      operationId: openapi.operations.ListOperations
      parameters:
        - name: openApiVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target OpenAPI version.
        - name: graphVersion
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target Microsoft Graph API version.
        - name: style
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Plain
              - PowerPlatform
              - PowerShell
              - GEAutocomplete
            default: Plain
          required: false
          description: The client for which the OpenAPI document needs to be formatted for.
        - name: title
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            default: Partial Graph API
          required: false
          description: The OpenAPI document title.
        - name: format
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - json
              - yaml
            default: json
          description: The OpenAPI document output format.
        - name: forceRefresh
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          required: false
          description: Reload the OpenAPI document.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            text/html: {}
  /openapi/tree:
    get:
      tags:
        - openapi.tree
      summary: Microsoft Graph OpenAPI document tree view.
      description: Get the Microsoft Graph API metadata CSDL document as an OpenAPIUrlTreeNode document.
      operationId: openapi.tree.GetUrlTreeNode
      parameters:
        - name: graphVersions
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            default: v1.0 and beta
          required: false
          description: The target Microsoft Graph API version. # Ex: ?graphVersions=v1.0 / ?graphVersions=beta / or ?graphVersions=* (for both)
        - name: forceRefresh
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          required: false
          description: Reload the OpenAPI document(s).
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Simplified OpenAPI document(s) rendered as an OpenApiUrlTreeNode document.
          content:
            application/vnd.oai.openapi+json: {} # JSON
  /toursteps:
    get:
      tags:
        - toursteps
      summary: Tour steps
      description: Get all Graph Explorer tour steps from Azure blob or a specified GitHub repository
      parameters:
        - name: org
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: Organization that a GitHub repo belongs to.
        - name: branchName
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: The target branch in the target GitHub repo.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/toursteps"
              example:
                TourSteps:
                  - target: ".sign-in-section"
                    content: "When you're signed in, you can run all queries with all request options. We recommend that you sign in with a sample Azure AD account where you are the tenant admin."
                    directionalHint: 10
                    spotlightClicks: true
                    hideCloseButton: true
                    autoNext: false
                    disableBeacon: true
                    advanced: true
                    title: "Sign in"
                    expectedActionType: "PROFILE_REQUEST_SUCCESS"
                    docsLink: ""
                    query: {
                        selectedVerb: "GET",
                        selectedVersion: "v1.0",
                        sampleUrl: "https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0",
                        sampleHeaders: []
                    }
                    active: true
        "204":
          description: No content
        "404":
          description: Not found
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
components:
  schemas:
    sample:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
          - category
          - method
          - humanName
          - requestUrl
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
          category:
            type: string
          method:
            type: string
            enum:
              - GET
              - PUT
              - POST
              - DELETE
              - PATCH
          humanName:
            type: string
          requestUrl:
            type: string
          docLink:
            type: string
          tip:
            type: string
          skipTest:
            type: boolean
          postBody:
            type: string
          headers:
            type: array
            items:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                value:
                  type: string
    permission:
      type: object
      required:
        - value
        - consentDisplayName
        - consentDescription
        - isAdmin
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        consentDisplayName:
          type: string
        consentDescription:
          type: string
        isAdmin:
          type: string
    changeLog:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          changeList:
            type: array
            items:
              type: object
              properties:
                id:
                  type: string
                apiChange:
                  type: string
                changedApiName:
                  type: string
                changeType:
                  type: string
                description:
                  type: string
                target:
                  type: string
              required:
                - id
                - apiChange
                - changedApiName
                - changeType
                - description
                - target
          id:
            type: string
          cloud:
            type: string
          version:
            type: string
          createdDateTime:
            type: string
          workloadArea:
            type: string
          subArea:
            type: string
        required:
          - changeList
          - id
          - cloud
          - version
          - createdDateTime
          - workloadArea
          - subArea
    knownIssue:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
          state:
            type: string
          title:
            type: string
          workloadArea:
            type: string
          description:
            type: string
          workAround:
            type: string
          link:
            type: string
    toursteps:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
          - target
          - content
          - directionalHint
        properties:
          target:
            type: string
          content:
            type: string
          directionalHint:
            type: number
          spotlightClicks:
            type: boolean
          hideCloseButton:
            type: boolean
          title:
            type: string
          autoNext:
            type: boolean
          disableBeacon:
            type: boolean
          expectedActionType:
            type: string
          query:
            type: object
            properties:
                selectedVerb:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                        - GET
                        - PUT
                        - POST
                        - DELETE
                        - PATCH
                selectedVersion:
                    type: string
                sampleUrl:
                    type: string
                sampleHeaders:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        name:
                            type: string
                        value:
                            type: string
          advanced:
            type: boolean

Error: notImplemented: path "/openapi/operations": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/html]
